articles.title: Villarreal's Champions League run continues as Bayern Munich waste key chances - ESPN India
articles.description: The "Yellow Submarine" has claimed another of Europe's elite sides as Villarreal continue their run and make Bayern rue some missed opportunities.
articles.content: MUNICH, Germany -- The Allianz Arena speakers blared "Bitter Sweet Symphony" and "The Show Must Go On" as soon as the final whistle blew on Bayern Munich's Champions League hopes for another season, … [+5744 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea denied heroic comeback as Karim Benzema settles Champions League thriller - The Independent
articles.description: Real Madrid 2-3 Chelsea (Real Madrid win 5-4 on aggregate): Goals from Mason Mount, Antonio Rudiger and Timo Werner put the European champions on the verge of an  improbable comeback, but Rodygo rescued the hosts before Karim Benzema settled a thrilling quart…
articles.content:
A scarcely believable night at the Bernabeu, that should leave Chelsea wondering how exactly they have gone out.
Many will rightly point to the seemingly eternal magnificence of Luka Modric and Kari… [+6014 chars]

articles.title: Study of data from NASA, ESA and Russian space agency explores effects of extended spaceflight on brain - EurekAlert
articles.description: Scientists from the U.S., Europe and Russia are part of a team releasing the results of a large collaborative study involving the effects of long duration spaceflight on the brain.
articles.content: Scientists from the U.S., Europe and Russia are part of a team releasing the results of a large collaborative study involving the effects of long duration spaceflight on the brain. It appears in the … [+4470 chars]

articles.title: Macron gets the jitters in Le Pen land - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The French president rows back on his flagship pension reform during a visit to Le Pen’s heartland.
articles.content:
PARIS Emmanuel Macron is showing signs of nerves as he steps up his campaigning ahead of the second round of the French presidential election.
